content:
That's a great plan! Organizing your photos and creating a rough outline will help you visualize the story you want to tell and make the design process much smoother.

I think it's a wonderful idea to create a digital version of the album and then print it out as a keepsake. This way, you'll have a physical copy that you can treasure, and you can also share the digital version with family and friends who might not be able to see the physical album.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and be creative! Digital scrapbooking is a great way to experiment with different designs and ideas without committing to a physical album.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'll be happy to help you along the way.

Good luck with your project, and I hope you enjoy creating your digital scrapbook!
